name: Get Physical With Quizzical | Mixed 15 Questions | 15 Questions

questions.text: In which film did Dick Van Dyke play Caractacus Potts?
D.V.D. is the acronym for Digital ___ Disk?
Napoleon died on the volcanic island of Saint Helena. Which ocean surrounds this island?
In what shape did planner Lucio Costa design Brazil's capital, Brasilia, to look like?
The 'Bullet Train' of Japan travels from Tokyo to where?
Walt Disney pioneered the first feature length cartoon film with 'Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs'(1938). Which Disney film followed next along with 'Fantasia' in 1940?
From what language do we get the words jungle, shampoo and Pyjamas?
Lake Tiberias is better known as what?
Approximately how long does the film 'Gone with the Wind' last?
Where was the birthplace of Joan of Arc?
About how long is the 'Panama Canal' that cuts journeys from the Caribbean to the Pacific by up to 7000 miles?
Of what nationality is the artist Christo, who specialises in covering natural features, for example, using 40,000 yards of canvas to wrap the 'Pont Neuf' bridge over the river Seine in 1985?
What was one of the world's first 'plastics' called, discovered by Reginald Gibson and Eric Fawcett after a laboratory accident six years previous?
What nationality was Felix Salten who wrote 'Bambi'?
(I bet you have never heard this one before!)In 'Treasure Island', who had a pet lizard called Annabelle?
questions.explanation:
Ben Gunn.

	Source of knowledge: 'Treasure Island' the characters : 10 matches by Mirago.
